Sql.query: insert into map_medicion48( mediccodi, medicfecha, tipoccodi, vermcodi, medictotal, medicpromedio, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 ) values( :mediccodi, :medicfecha, :tipoccodi, :vermcodi, :medictotal, :medicpromedio, :h1, :h2, :h3, :h4, :h5, :h6, :h7, :h8, :h9, :h10, :h11, :h12, :h13, :h14, :h15, :h16, :h17, :h18, :h19, :h20, :h21, :h22, :h23, :h24, :h25, :h26, :h27, :h28, :h29, :h30, :h31, :h32, :h33, :h34, :h35, :h36, :h37, :h38, :h39, :h40, :h41, :h42, :h43, :h44, :h45, :h46, :h47, :h48 )

update map_medicion48 set medicfecha = :medicfecha, tipoccodi = :tipoccodi, vermcodi = :vermcodi, medictotal = :medictotal, medicpromedio = :medicpromedio, h1 = :h1, h2 = :h2, h3 = :h3, h4 = :h4, h5 = :h5, h6 = :h6, h7 = :h7, h8 = :h8, h9 = :h9, h10 = :h10, h11 = :h11, h12 = :h12, h13 = :h13, h14 = :h14, h15 = :h15, h16 = :h16, h17 = :h17, h18 = :h18, h19 = :h19, h20 = :h20, h21 = :h21, h22 = :h22, h23 = :h23, h24 = :h24, h25 = :h25, h26 = :h26, h27 = :h27, h28 = :h28, h29 = :h29, h30 = :h30, h31 = :h31, h32 = :h32, h33 = :h33, h34 = :h34, h35 = :h35, h36 = :h36, h37 = :h37, h38 = :h38, h39 = :h39, h40 = :h40, h41 = :h41, h42 = :h42, h43 = :h43, h44 = :h44, h45 = :h45, h46 = :h46, h47 = :h47, h48 = :h48 where mediccodi = :mediccodi

select mediccodi, medicfecha, tipoccodi, vermcodi, medictotal, medicpromedio, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 where mediccodi = :mediccodi from map_medicion48

select mediccodi, medicfecha, tipoccodi, vermcodi, medictotal, medicpromedio, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from map_medicion48

select mediccodi, medicfecha, tipoccodi, vermcodi, medictotal, medicpromedio, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from map_medicion48 where vermcodi = {0}

select m8.*,mv.vermnumero,mv.vermfeccreacion,mv.vermusucreacion from map_medicion48 m8 inner join map_version mv on mv.vermcodi=m8.vermcodi where TRUNC(m8.medicfecha) between to_date('{0}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and mv.vermestado <> 3 and (m8.TIPOCCODI in ({2}) or '{2}' = '-1')
